title: $\nu^2$-Flows: Fast and improved neutrino reconstruction in multi-neutrino final states with conditional normalizing flows. (arXiv:2307.02405v2 [hep-ph] UPDATED)
abstract:
In this work we introduce $
u^2$-Flows, an extension of the $
u$-Flows method to final states containing multiple neutrinos. The architecture can natively scale for all combinations of object types and multiplicities in the final state for any desired neutrino multiplicities. In $t ar{t}$ dilepton events, the momenta of both neutrinos and correlations between them are reconstructed more accurately than when using the most popular standard analytical techniques, and solutions are found for all events. Inference time is significantly faster than competing methods, and can be reduced further by evaluating in parallel on graphics processing units. We apply $
u^2$-Flows to $t ar{t}$ dilepton events and show that the per-bin uncertainties in unfolded distributions is much closer to the limit of performance set by perfect neutrino reconstruction than standard techniques. For the chosen double differential observables $
u^2$-Flows results in improved statistical precision for each bin by

translated_title: $\nu^2$-流：在多中微子末态中使用条件归一化流进行快速和改进的中微子重建
translated_abstract:
在这项工作中，我们引入了$
u^2$-流方法，这是$
u$-流方法对于包含多个中微子的末态的一种扩展。该架构可以原生地为末态中的所有对象类型和多重性组合进行缩放，适用于任何所需的中微子多重性。在$t ar{t}$二轻子事件中，与使用最流行的标准解析技术相比，中微子的动量以及它们之间的相关性可以更准确地重建，并且可以找到所有事件的解。推断时间比竞争方法显著更快，并且可以通过在图形处理单元上并行评估来进一步减少。我们将$
u^2$-流应用于$t ar{t}$二轻子事件，并展示了展开分布中每个箱子的不确定性比标准技术更接近完美中微子重建的性能界限。对于选择的双微分观测量，$
u^2$-流可以在每个箱子中提供改进的统计精度。
tldr:
本文介绍了$
u^2$-流方法，它是$
u$-流方法在包含多个中微子的末态中的扩展。与标准解析技术相比，$
u^2$-流在重建中微子动量和相关性方面更准确，推断时间更快，并且可以提供改进的统计精度。
en_tdlr:
This paper introduces the $
u^2$-Flows method, which is an extension of the $
u$-Flows method for final states containing multiple neutrinos. Compared to standard analytical techniques, $
u^2$-Flows provides more accurate reconstruction of neutrino momenta and correlations, faster inference time, and improved statistical precision.
